row.name: CONN_AUTH_BASIC_PREEMPTIVE#
row.xui: <dynradiogroup alt="1" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="CONN_AUTH_BASIC_PREEMPTIVEs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="Preemptive" tooltip="Activates preemptive authentication. Preemptive authentication sends the authentication information without waiting for the server to give an unauthorized response. This reduces some overhead, and may be required in cases where the server does not reply with an unauthorized response. You use preemptive authorization when you trust the endpoint enough to send authentication credentials somewhere without being asked for them." required="0"> <properties> <entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry> <entry name="text">Preemptive</entry> <entry name="quotes"/> <entry name="id">CONN_AUTH_BASIC_PREEMPTIVEs.00</entry> <entry name="enabled">0</entry> <entry name="focus">0</entry> <entry name="tooltip">Activates preemptive authentication. Preemptive authentication sends the authentication information without waiting for the server to give an unauthorized response. This reduces some overhead, and may be required in cases where the server does not reply with an unauthorized response. You use preemptive authorization when you trust the endpoint enough to send authentication credentials somewhere without being asked for them.</entry> <entry name="customfield"/> <entry name="modifiable">1</entry> <entry name="xmlkey"/> <entry name="xmlpath"/> <entry name="initvalue"/> </properties> </dynradiogroup>
